channel.title: unix on Jonathan Loscalzo
channel.description: Recent content in unix on Jonathan Loscalzo

item.title: Some Bash/unix helpful commands
item.description: Bash/Unix Commands AWESOME CHEATSHEETS, BASH Devhit - bash Hostinger - Linux Commands Guru99 - Linux cheathsheet ls ls -a # hidden files ls -la # large list, more information ls -lah # size in kb ls -R # list recursively In .bashrc: alias ll = "ls -lahF" rsync Rsync - wikipedia Linux Techie - Rsync Hostinger - Rsync rsync file dest/ rsync dir/* dest/ rsync -a dir/ dest/ # file mode rsync -av dir/ dest/ # verbose rsync -azv dir/ dest/ # compress during transfering rsync -av --dry-run dir/ dest/ # execution without result, only to evaluate output.
